doctor.name: Dr. Md. Humayun Kabir
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Humayun Kabir is a Endocrinologist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS( Health), DEM (BIRDEM), FCPS (Endocrinology-Thesis). He is a Assistant Registrar, Endocrinology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Humayun Kabir at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 9am to 10pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: City Tower, House # 01, Mir Mosharraf Hossain Road, Coart Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. Hasan Mahfuz Reza (Likhon)
doctor.degree: MBBS, CCD, DEM, MPhil, MACP, MSc, MPH
doctor.info: Dr. Hasan Mahfuz Reza (Likhon) is a Endocrinologist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, CCD, DEM, MPhil, MACP, MSc, MPH. He is a Consultant Endocrinologist at Sono Consultation Centre, Kushtia. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Centre For Hormone Care. Practicing hour of Dr. Hasan Mahfuz Reza (Likhon) at Centre For Hormone Care is 9am to 1pm & 4pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu), am to 4pm (Friday).

chamber.address: Sono Consultation Centre, Sono Tower-2, Room 502, Courtpara, Kushtia
chamber.visitingTime: 9am to 1pm & 4pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu), am to 4pm (Friday)
